post.text: "[If] you've run for office on family values, why wouldn't you walk away from him months ago? When you heard your nominee for president call women pigs and dogs and slobs, and grade them not for their character or their intellect, but on a scale of 1-10. You don't have to be a husband or a father to stand up for women." â€”President Obama to Republicans who still support Trump

comment.author: Michael
comment.text: Obamas haters are among the biggest traitors in the history of this great nation.

replies.author: Albert
replies.text: That's a statement with no foundation, you make claims without any supporting evidence, you're as useless as someone who shows up to the bodybuilding competition and never went to the gym. Do your homework on Obama and Hillary.
